tests.description: Validates direct pod communication across different worker nodes, testing CNI networking and inter-node communication
tests.success_message: Pod netshoot-test-2 is reachable from pod netshoot-test-1

tests.description: Validates Kubernetes service discovery, HTTP connectivity, and load balancing across multiple pod replicas
tests.success_message: Service to Pod connectivity test passed - HTTP connectivity and load balancing working

tests.description: Validates kube-proxy inter-node routing by ensuring services work when accessed from pods on different nodes
tests.success_message: Cross-node service connectivity validated - kube-proxy inter-node routing confirmed

tests.description: Comprehensively validates Kubernetes DNS infrastructure including service discovery, FQDN resolution, and DNS search domains
tests.success_message: DNS resolution test passed - service FQDN and short name resolution working
